articles.author: The Pioneer
articles.title: One more succumbs to COVID-19, toll rises to 596 - Daily Pioneer
articles.description:
Puducherry logged one more death on Tuesday due to COVID-19, pushing the toll to 596 while 149 new cases were registered, raising the tally to 35,325.

The fresh cases were identified at the end of examination of 4,004 samples today.

articles.title: Covid-19: Scientists find evidence that coronavirus superspreading is fat-tailed - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Superspreaders, infected individuals who result in an outsized number of secondary cases, are believed to underlie a significant fraction of total SARS-CoV-2 transmission.

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: India, world’s largest sugar consumer, wants its people to eat more - Economic Times
articles.description: Mills in India are eyeing increased consumption as a way to cut the nations chronic oversupply, which stems partly from the favorable incentives provided to growers in politically powerful rural areas.
